unnormalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hit Indian Roads!**
normalised: Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hit Indian Roads!

unnormalised: Folks, the auto market's heating up faster than a tandoor oven! This week saw a flurry of vehicle launches, from budget-friendly bikes to luxury SUVs fit for a Maharaja.
normalised: Folks, the auto market is heating up faster than a tandoor oven! This week saw a flurry of vehicle launches, from budget-friendly bikes to luxury S U Vs fit for a Maharaja.

unnormalised: First up, Maruti Suzuki dropped the new "Challenger" hatchback – rumored to be a Swift killer! Initial reviews say it's got great mileage, perfect for navigating those Bangalore traffic jams. Starting price is around Rs. 6 Lakh.
normalised: First up, Maruti Suzuki dropped the new "Challenger" hatchback – rumored to be a Swift killer! Initial reviews say it is got great mileage, perfect for navigating those Bangalore traffic jams. Starting price is around rupee six lakh.

unnormalised: Then, Mahindra unveiled their revamped Scorpio, now boasting a massive touchscreen and more legroom than a Rajdhani Express sleeper berth. Expect to see it tearing up the ghat roads soon! They are claiming 15 kmpl!
normalised: Then, Mahindra unveiled their revamped Scorpio, now boasting a massive touchscreen and more legroom than a Rajdhani Express sleeper berth. Expect to see it tearing up the ghat roads soon! They are claiming fifteen kilometer per liter!

unnormalised: Electric vehicles are also making a splash. Ola Electric announced pre-orders for their new scooter, promising a range of 200 km on a single charge. Dr. Sharma from IIT Delhi gave it a thumbs up for its battery tech.
normalised: Electric vehicles are also making a splash. Ola Electric announced pre-orders for their new scooter, promising a range of two hundred kilometer on a single charge. Doctor Sharma from I I T Delhi gave it a thumbs up for its battery tech.

unnormalised: Finally, BMW launched their flagship X9 SUV, complete with a panoramic sunroof and a parking assist feature that can parallel park in a space smaller than my neighbor’s balcony (around 80 sq ft)! Price tag? A cool Rs. 1.5 Crore. Buckle up, folks, it’s going to be a wild ride!
normalised: Finally, B M W launched their flagship X nine S U V, complete with a panoramic sunroof and a parking assist feature that can parallel park in a space smaller than my neighbor’s balcony (around eighty square feet)! Price tag? A cool rupee one point five crore. Buckle up, folks, it is going to be a wild ride!
